title: Aqua Scepter
summaries: The Aqua Scepter is a magic weapon that can be obtained from Locked Gold Chests within the Dungeon, or from Golden Lock Boxes found in Dungeon Crates from fishing. It auto-fires an arc of water particles which can pierce an infinite number of enemies.

The Aqua Scepter can be continuously used to keep enemies juggled. However, the sprite of the Aqua Scepter itself deals no damage. Therefore, an enemy too close to the wielder will not get hit by the water, and simply move past the outstretched wand to hit the player.

statistics.Damage: 27 / 15 (Magic)
statistics.Tooltip: Sprays out a shower of water
statistics.Sell: 175
